articles.title: Explained: BA.2 sub-variant of Omicron – not new, rise mainly in Europe - The Indian Express
articles.description: What is BA.2 Omicron variant: Several countries have reported the discovery of BA.2, a sub-variant of Omicron. What do we know about this sub-variant? Is it present in India? Is it more harmful?
articles.content: In the last couple of weeks, there has been a noticeable increase in the discovery of BA.2 sub-variant of Omicron from several countries, leading to fresh worries about the possibility of another sur… [+4125 chars]

articles.title: Australia COVID updates live: NSW, Victoria report 44 more deaths - The Australian Financial Review
